title: Empires and Allies apk mod
description:
Empires and Allies
v1.14.919242.production apk mod

Welcome to Empires & Allies, an all-new modern military strategy game that puts the weapons of modern war at your fingertips in a never-ending battle to conquer the world.

FEATURES:
- DESIGN YOUR PERFECT ARMY from the arsenals of todayâ€™s militaries with battle-hardened tanks, drones, helicopters, and more.
- DEPLOY MODERN WEAPONS including tactical nukes, hellfire missiles, and orbital strikes.
- DYNAMIC BATTLEFIELDS deliver increasingly difficult scenarios that emulate the unpredictability of warfare.
- JOIN ALLIANCES to fortify defenses and reinforce attacking units
- SAVE THE WORLD from the GRA, an evil terrorist organization, and defend your territories from other players

 What's New (November 25, 2015)
Fixed bug causing 'Error 22' at login
New Event System:
- New challenges rolling out regularly!
- Win unique rewards!
- Tap the Calendar Icon for details
Unit Tuning:
- Striker VI firing range increases as it levels up
- Airmed Drone is no longer targeted by Riflemen, Tanks, Spiders & hacked Guard Towers
- Titan Tank is immune to battlefield EMP from Stealth Tanks & 

Spider death stun
Stability and bug fixes!

Hacks:
1)All Headquarters health including your headquarters is very low(But you have your real headquarters health when you are under attack)
2)Enemy to Attack cost 0
3)Find another Enemy to Attack also cost 0
4) While training troops all "Finish now" Costs only 0 gold

This app has banner advertisements 

Requirements: Android 4.1 +
